headline: 2 Stocks That Could Be Easy Wealth Builders
summary: In a sense, the market does not offer "easy" solutions for wealth building.  A growth stock that course-corrects from poor decisions can also present opportunity.  As long as one exercises patience and a tolerance for stock movements, these two e-commerce conglomerates below are in a solid position to build wealth for their shareholders.

headline: 2 Stocks That Could Crush the Market in 2025
summary: Fund managers often make big changes before the new year, which can ignite a "Santa Claus rally."  This effect pushes stock prices up in December, so individual investors must start considering their moves now.  Two stocks that I will likely increase my position in before the new year are Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) and PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL).
